import React from 'react'; import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import './ExperienceDetails.css'; import { FaClock, FaMapMarkerAlt, FaInfoCircle, FaShoppingCart, FaCar, FaWalking } from 'react-icons/fa'; const ExperienceDetails = () => { const location = useLocation(); const { experience } = location.state || {}; if (!experience) { return
No experience data found
; } return (

{experience.title}

On August 30, 1999, the Hassan II Mosque in Casablanca was officially inaugurated, marking the completion of this architectural marvel.

About

{experience.description || "This magnificent mosque is one of the few religious sites open to non-Muslims. The minaret is the world's tallest at 210 meters."}

Price

{experience.price}

Guided Tours

{experience.guidedTour}

Distance

{experience.distance}

Transport Times

{experience.times[0]} by car

{experience.times[1]} walking

); }; export default ExperienceDetails;
